Plot: During the last two years of her life, Princess Diana embarks on a final rite of passage: a secret love affair with Pakistani heart surgeon Hasnat Khan.
Title: Diana
Writer: Stephen Jeffreys, Kate Snell (inspired by the book 'Diana Her Last Love' by)
Actors: Naomi Watts, Cas Anvar, Charles Edwards, James Puddephatt
tomatoConsensus: Naomi Watts tries hard in the title role, but Diana buries her efforts under a shoddy script and clumsy direction.
